attributes.action: ensure no additional tax burden for low paid as a result of abolition of 10p tax band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most low paid workers without children and pensioners under 65 will pay more tax as a result of the budget whereas most wage earners earning more than £18000 ,pensioners over 65 and couples with families will at least be in a tax neutral situation.
There has to be some measure to overcome this-surely it was not meant that the poorer people pay more?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
